name: International Conference on NLP, AI & Information Retrieval
content: International Conference on NLP, AI & Information Retrieval (NLAII 2023) October 07 \~ 08, 2023, Virtual Conference https://nlaii2023.org/ Scope & Topics International Conference on NLP, AI & Information Retrieval (NLAII 2023) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Natural Language Processing, AI and Information Retrieval. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to: Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following • Argumentation Mining and Applications • Artificial Intelligence Tools & Applications • Automatic Control • Big Data & Business Intelligence • Bioinformatics • Computational Theories of Learning • Computer Vision and Speech Understanding • Corpus Analysis • Data Mining and Machine Learning Tools • Deep Learning, Neural Languages and NLP • Fuzzy Logic • Heuristic and AI Planning Strategies and Tools • Hybrid Intelligent Systems • Information Extraction, Retrieval • Information Retrieval and AI • Intelligent System Architectures • Knowledge Representation& Knowledge based Systems • Multimedia & Cognitive Informatics • Natural language and Ubiquitous Computing • Natural Language in Conceptual Modeling • Natural Language Processing • Neural Networks • NLP techniques for Ambient Intelligence • Information Technology in Education • NLP techniques for Internet of Things (IoT) • Pervasive Computing and Ambient Intelligence • Programming Languages • Question Answering (QA) • Reasoning and Evolution • Recent Trends and Developments • Robotics • Semantic Processing & NLP • Semantic Web Techniques and Technologies • Semantic Web, Open Linked Data, and Ontologies • Social Media and Web Analytics • Soft Computing Theory and Applications • Software & Hardware Architectures • Text Mining • Web Intelligence Applications & Search Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by September 09, 2023\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal on Cybernetics & Informatics (IJCI) (Confirmed). Selected papers from NLAII 2023, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals. • International Journal on Natural Language Computing (IJNLC) • International Journal of Ubiquitous Computing (IJU) • International Journal of Artificial Intelligence & Applications (IJAIA) • International Journal of Ambient Systems and Applications (IJASA) • International Journal of Fuzzy Logic Systems (IJFLS) Contact Us Here's where you can reach us: nlaii@nlaii2023.org (or) nlaiiconf@yahoo.com For more details, please visit: https://nlaii2023.org/ Paper Submission Link: https://nlaii2023.org/submission/index.php
